name: Corrosive Scales
desc: Target 1 Insect monster you control; equip this card to that target. Your opponent cannot attack Insect monsters, except for the equipped monster you control. Each time your opponent Normal/Special Summons a monster, or activates a card or effect, place 1 Scale Counter on each face-up monster your opponent controls. Monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK/DEF for each Scale Counter it has.
